info.method: shake/top (port wine pour over the top)

ingredients.ingredient: red port wine  or red wine

description: This is the version of the cocktail from the menu of the bar Don't tell Mama (Moscow, now closed) on the basis of the Firerock wines Juniper, it is with wine notes, light, summer cocktail.

author.name: Roman Tabakov
author.bio:
Roman has worked for more than 10 years in the most prestigious Moscow restaurants, bars and clubs such as Sixty, Dont tell Mama, Chateau De Fantoma, Marusya Bar & Restaurant, Vision Cocktail Hall, Soho Rooms and others. He was in the professional association Russian Cocktail Club. He is participant and winner of prestigious professional competitions:
Diageo Reserve World Class
Disaronno Mixing Star
Cantineros de Rusia
Bols Arownd The World
Bacardi Legacy Cocktail Competition
Calvados Trophie
Chivas Master Cocktail Competition
